<h1> Abdul-Nasah Soale</h1>
I am currently a Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Statistical Science at Fox School of Business
at Temple University. I received my M.S. Mathematical Sciences from East Tennessee State
University (ETSU) in 2016. Prior to grad school, I obtained my B.Sc. Actuarial Science from Kwame Nkrumah
University of Science and Technology (KNUST) in Ghana in 2012.
